body.name: Extra Large Acrylic Cutting Board With Counter Lip | 24" x 18" Textured Non Slip Acrylic Cutting Board For Kitchen | Clear Cutting Board For Countertop | Over The Counter Cutting Board
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 16 hrs 1 min
features: HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: We made our acrylic cutting board with counter lip to be thick, durable, and warp-resistant so it can be safely used for all your kitchen needs.

NON-SLIP ACCESSORIES: We added 8 silicone pads to provide you with a non slip cutting board for kitchen, even if the surface is wet! We also included a complementary silicone mat that can be used as a non-slip base.

HIDE THE SCRATCH MARKS: This clear cutting board for countertop features a unique, textured and wavy underside. This design helps to hide those ugly knife nicks and it makes the scratches nearly invisible!

NOT JUST FOR SLICING & DICING: Due to its size (24"" x 18""), this extra large acrylic cutting board for kitchen counter can also be used to create extra space in the kitchen. Simply pop it over the sink and voila, more space in an instant.

MADE FOR CHEFS OF ALL LEVELS: Our kitchen cutting board is made for everyone, from culinary newbies to professional chefs! Every creation, be it a humble sandwich or a gourmet feast, deserves the best prop, and that's what we aim to deliver.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Makes Cooking Meals More Enjoyable This versatile cutting board will certainly be your go-to when you're slicing and dicing, but it offers so much more than that. It's a multitasker that bridges gaps, like over dual sinks or that tiny stove nook (just ensure the stove's cooled down). Whether you're in a big house, tiny apartment or simply on the hunt for clever ways to maximize space, this board's always ready to offer that extra inch or shield your precious counters. Uniquely Designed to Hide Scratches No one likes to look at those unavoidable scratch marks that develop on a cutting board with frequent use. With our innovative acrylic cutting board, that's no longer an issue. Now, we can't make them magically disappear but we have the next best thing. The brilliant design features a smooth top, perfect for prepping, while the textured back quietly hides the scratches left behind by the knives. Larger Size for More Surface Protection Working on a small cutting board can be a pain in the you-know-what but dealing with one that's gigantic can be equally challenging. Our acrylic countertop cutting board is a perfect balance. It measures a manageable 24 x 18 inches (with a convenient 1.5-inch lip), giving you plenty of space to prepare food while providing some serious protection for your surfaces in and around the kitchen. Tools to Inspire Cooks of All Skill Levels Our top-notch culinary products are designed for everyone, whether you're taking baby steps or you've been at the stove for years. We're all about nudging folks to cook a bit more at home and save those restaurant trips for special occasions. Honestly, there's just something heartwarming about whipping up your own dishes. It feeds the stomach, sure, but it's also pure comfort food for the soul.

Can Handle Even the Busiest Kitchens This scratch-hiding cutting board is crafted from top-tier acrylic that will resist the usual kitchen wear and tear, promising you years of reliable service. While it's sturdy and all, please keep those piping-hot pots and pans away from it. Anything up to a warm 85°F? Totally fine. But scorching hot, let's not. Non-Porous, So It's Easy to Keep Clean Our acrylic board has a leg up when it comes to cleanliness. Unlike wood, it's less likely to trap all of that icky stuff. Cleaning's a snap, too - just a simple hand scrub with soap and water is all it takes. Plus, its sleek design and clarity mean that you might not be so eager to tuck away when you're not using it. Will Not Slide Around While You Prep A cutting board that is slipping and sliding all over your countertop is bad news. We made sure that won't be a concern with this one. Our cutting board comes with anti-slip silicone pads, ensuring it stays right where you want it. So, chop away with confidence and leave the sliding to your kitchen drawers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We started with one to protect our new butcher block counter from the steam released from our dishwasher. Love it so much we order two more for our coffee bar and next to our stove. The textured finish is decorative yet we still enjoy our beautiful counter! Hardly notice any stains before we easily wipe them away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The texture does a good job at hiding wear and tear that would otherwise be distracting.
reviews.reviewText: The texture does a good job at hiding wear and tear that would otherwise be distracting. I bought three as additional protection for my counter-tops and use as a cutting board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cutting Board
reviews.reviewText: I've had several cutting boards over the years. This cutting board surpasses any that I've ever purchased. Not only is it larger than others that I have own but it's thicker and heavier, plus it has an underside of bubbles that hide any surface scratches on the top of board. The best feature is that the lip of the board is also thick and fits snugly against the countertop with the use of the included adhesive circles for mounting on board's underside, securing it from ever moving. I strongly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for the Indoors
reviews.reviewText: This worked out just as I had hoped. I bought three of them for our new outdoor BBQ counter so that my husband can cut meat and use when he is handling food and I can't get a plate or something to him quick enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my counter to cut and prepare my meals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice but
reviews.reviewText: The first cutting board came broken on the edge so i returned it. The second came not packaged as well as the first and ends of box were pushed in and without the silicone pad it said it would come with. The packaging inside appeared to show signs of it being transferred from another box. It rough around corners but I’ll keep it.I must go buy a silicone pad since it wasn’t in this package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large acrylic board
reviews.reviewText: Very large acrylic board, durable mostly, I had a part crack after a light fall, make sure you have the spade to store it because it is XL great for prepping any kind of food

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this board
reviews.reviewText: This is strong and sturdy. I use this in my laundry room on my utility sink to fold clothes
